subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the birthplace of Maharana Pratap?
question_hi: महाराजा प्रतिपाद किस जिले में थे।
explanation_en:
Maharana Pratap was born in Chittor, Rajasthan. He was a prominent Rana of Mewar and fought against the Mughal Emperor Akbar in the Battle of Haldighati.
Explanation in Hindi: Maharana Pratap ne Rajasthan mein Chittor, Rajasthan mein jagah diya tha. Ek samay Mewar ke Rana the aur Akbar ki Mughal Emperor ke liye Haldighati ki baat mein zindagi mein nikal gaya.
उत्तराष्ट्र: Rajasthan
उम्रांटियां: Mewar
परिक्षा: Haldighati Battles
विद्वार्थ: Maharana Pratap
परिवार्थ: Chittor
